TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit CookieCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable
type CookieCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Provides a collection container for instances of the class.

span.span: Provides a collection container for instances of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會實作介面，以提供的一般機制，處理 cookie 的集合。The class implements an interface to provide a general mechanism for handling collections of cookies. 比方說，這是在應用程式為了儲存多個伺服器的 cookie 的情況下很有用。For example, this is useful in the case where an application is designed to store cookies for multiple servers.

summary.span: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through a .

span.span: Gets an enumerator that can iterate through a .

returns.span: An instance of an implementation of an interface that can iterate through a .

span.span: An instance of an implementation of an interface that can iterate through a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您應該使用只是用來讀取集合中的資料。You should use an only to read data in the collection. 列舉值無法用於修改基礎集合。Enumerators cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection. 建立列舉值時，它會擷取集合中的目前狀態的快照。When an enumerator is created, it takes a snapshot of the current state of the collection. 如果變更集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除項目，此快照集取得同步，並列舉值擲回。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, this snapshot gets out of sync and the enumerator throws an . 從相同的集合，同時建立兩個列舉值可能會產生不同的快照集的集合。Two enumerators created from the same collection at the same time can produce different snapshots of the collection.
